message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling you this product. I believe it holds immense value, and while my asking price is $2,000,000, I'm open to hearing your thoughts on this.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer and understand the value of the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $2,000,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,500,000.
